description:
Two drawings are on the wall. The new drawing next to the girl is of the home Rito once lived in with her parents. Rito is overjoyed when everyone tells her they like it. However, the drawing of the girl is taken by a powerful Scooper. Upon seeing the depressed trio, Misa suggests they cheer up by creating something together and takes her first stab at creating beaded accessories.
Source: crunchyroll
